properties.name: database.auto-commit
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable auto-commit mode for database transactions.

properties.name: database.driver
properties.description: Database driver class name. Must not be blank.

properties.name: database.enable
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the database configuration. Defaults to true.

properties.name: database.max-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of connections in the pool.

properties.name: database.min-pool-size
properties.description: Minimum number of idle connections in the pool.

properties.name: database.password
properties.description: Database password for authentication. Must not be blank.

properties.name: database.properties
properties.description: Additional database properties as key-value pairs.

properties.name: database.type
properties.description: Database type identifier. Must not be blank.

properties.name: database.url
properties.description: Database connection URL. Must not be blank.

properties.name: database.username
properties.description: Database username for authentication. Must not be blank.
